title: Little League Rapist | True Crime Today
description:
A Little League umpire in Washington has been charged with rape and meth possession in connection with a teen girl.

A lady from California has been charged with murder after she allegedly struck a man she saw attempting to run over her cat.

An Alaska man was convicted in the 1993 sexual assault, stabbing, and shooting death of a lady who was discovered in a college bathroom.
